snippet: Four members of the armed forces who have served in Afghanistan and Iraq will take a whirl on the dance floor Monday night with President Obama, Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. and their wives.
abstract: Four members of the armed forces who have served in Afghanistan and Iraq will take a whirl on the dance floor Monday night with President Obama, Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. and their wives.

headline.main: Military Veterans to Dance With Obamas and Bidens at Inauguration
